title: Hungary and the Mongol Invasions MCQ 1

content.question: Which of the following features of Europe in the period circa 1200â€“1450 most directly contributed to the fact that the king of Hungary did not receive the military assistance that he requested in 1241, as mentioned in the third paragraph?

choices.label: The existence of numerous feudal states that were frequently in conflict with one another
The development of parliaments that could check royal authority
The growing political power of regional trade organizations such as the Hanseatic League
